dict.string: QuickReminders needs access to Calendars to create and manage your reminders through natural language input.
QuickReminders needs full access to Calendars to create and manage your reminders through natural language input.
QuickReminders needs write access to Calendars to create reminders through natural language input.
QuickReminders needs access to Reminders to create and manage your reminders through natural language input.
QuickReminders needs full access to Reminders to create and manage your reminders through natural language input.
QuickReminders needs microphone access to recognize speech and create reminders using voice commands.
QuickReminders needs speech recognition access to convert your voice commands into reminders.
